description: We are creating Quietway routes across London

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Quietways are continuous and convenient cycle routes on less-busy backstreets across London. Most of the first seven Quietways have sections that are complete."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

The routes are clearly marked with purple signs to help cyclists find their way along roads they may never have cycled along before. Quietways are ideal for people who want to cycle on lower-traffic streets, especially if they are new to cycling in London.
From summer 2019, we're combining new cycle routes, Cycle Superhighways and Quietways into one cycle network called Cycleways.
Maps show full proposed routes with sections completed as of May 2019.

Route consultations will be carried out by the boroughs locally. We are consulting locally on the TfL Road Network (TLRN) junctions where changes are being proposed. Visit the Quietways consultation page .
